Email Notifications/customizations/index.title: Customizations
Email Notifications/customizations/index.description: Customizations allow controlling notifications for message events, group events, and call events. Users can set preferences for incoming notifications based on notification schedules, Do Not Disturb (DND) mode, and the mute status of specific conversations.

Legacy Notifications (Extension)/push-no.title: iOS - APNs
Legacy Notifications (Extension)/push-no.description: Apple Push Notification service or APNs is used to send notifications to iOS devices. With this, you can also use Apple's CallKit for showing the call screen.

Overview/index.title: Overview
Overview/index.description: Notifications play a crucial role in alerting users to activity within conversations, such as new messages, replies, reactions, and more. CometChat facilitates user engagement through various notification methods, including:

Push Notifications/customizations/index.title: Customizations
Push Notifications/customizations/index.description: Customizations allow controlling notifications for message events, group events, and call events. Users can set preferences for incoming notifications based on notification schedules, Do Not Disturb (DND) mode, and the mute status of specific conversations.

SMS Notifications/customizations/index.title: Customizations
SMS Notifications/customizations/index.description: Customizations allow controlling notifications for message events, group events, and call events. Users can set preferences for incoming notifications based on notification schedules, Do Not Disturb (DND) mode, and the mute status of specific conversations.
